column4: is there any particular reason why my title bar sometimes goes blank and has a line across it?
could anyone tell me why a line appears across a blank title bar in my window?
in the window decorator?
i dont know. i use nvidia though and it started when i activated the driver
you could try envyng-gtk if all else fails
bash: envyng-gtk: command not found
sudo apt-get install envyng-gtk; gksudo envyng-gtk
that didnt work
are you using kde or gnome?
it'll be in your menus too
i dont use gnome so yu'll have find it
yes it only appears when i have desktop effects
top for ram, in terminal: cat /proc/cpuinfo
there is a menu option but i forgot what it is
sudo apt-get install ia32-libs
then you can install i386 debs, its a better option to compile
or find a 64bit deb
its still telling me "wrong architecture"
you need to use --fore-arch
how?
sudo dpkg -i --force-arch <deb file>
sudo dpkg -i --force-architecture <deb file name>
alt drag it
does alt + drag not allow it?
